CustomField.description: Profit margin percentage for this line item based on unit price and device cost
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Unit_Price__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Device__r.Cost_Price__c)), Unit_Price__c > 0), ((Unit_Price__c - Device__r.Cost_Price__c) / Unit_Price__c) * 100, NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Profit margin for this line item calculated from unit price and device cost.
CustomField.label: Line Profit Margin (%)
